con:interface.name: Smartbear Calculator
con:interface.con:description: A simple calculator for internal consumption

con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"A simple calculator for internal consumption","version":"1.0.0","title":"Smartbear 2.0","url":"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"}},"schemes":["http","https"],"paths":{"/add":{"post":{"summary":"Add two numbers together.","operationId":"addInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/Design-Swagger/calculator-domain/1.0.0#/definitions/standardResponse"}},"404":{"description":"Bad input.","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/Design-Swagger/calculator-domain/1.0.0#/definitions/standardError"}}}}},"/subtract":{"post":{"summary":"Subtract inputOne from inputTwo","operationId":"subtractInput","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"inputOne","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/Design-Swagger/calculator-domain/1.0.0#/definitions/standardResponse"}},"404":{"description":"Bad resolve","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"inputTwo","in":"query","description":"First input to resolve","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successful operation.","schema":{"$ref":"https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/Design-Swagger/calculator-domain/1.0.0#/definitions/standardResponse"}},"404":{"description":"Bad
